special_abilities.desc: If the goat moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 5 (2d4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.
special_abilities.name: Charge

special_abilities.desc: The goat has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone.
special_abilities.name: Sure-Footed

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Ram
